metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Race condition in the VMware driver in OpenStack Compute (Nova) before 2014.1.4 and 2014.2 before 2014.2rc1 allows remote authenticated users to access unintended consoles by spawning an instance that triggers the same VNC port to be allocated to two different instances.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> requires use with unsupported VMware ESX driver. This is not compiled in to libvirt in the Ubuntu archive, which makes this code path unavailable in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: nova: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
